**User:**
Hey, I've got a question about using the `sendcurrency` command with the `preconvert` option. What happens to my tokens if the target token launches after I use this command?

**AI Assistant:**
If the target token launches after you use the `sendcurrency` command with the `preconvert` option, you will either find the converted amount of the target token in your wallet or have your original token amount returned. So, you don't have to worry about losing your tokens if the target token takes some time to launch. Do you have any other questions about using `sendcurrency` with `preconvert`?
